title: Bug 13189: Refactoring - Deleting fields context menu is overridden by message dialog
description:
On LinuxMotif and w2k, following steps were performed: 
1. Set up JUnit. 
2. Enable the option 'Code Generator - Remove prefix from field names'. 
3. Open TestCase.java. 
4. In the outliner, right-click on 'fName'.
OB: After right-clicking on 'fName' in the outliner, the context menu for deleting fields is not displayed.
SR: Ensure that the context menu for deleting fields is displayed when right-clicking on 'fName' in the outliner.
